sections.changelog:
Changed

  • Admin CSS migrated to MVweb UI Kit "Classic Clean" shared framework
  • Split admin styles into `admin.css` (shared UI Kit) and `plugin.css` (plugin-specific)
  • Replaced custom `--mvweb-pc-*` CSS variables with shared `--mvweb-*` UI Kit variables
  • HTML templates updated to use UI Kit classes: `.mvweb-section-title`, `.mvweb-select`, `.mvweb-checkbox`, `.mvweb-btn`, `.mvweb-badge`, `.mvweb-notice`, `.mvweb-table`, `.mvweb-details`, `.mvweb-help`
  • Help tab migrated from `.mvweb-pc-help` to shared `.mvweb-help` BEM structure
  • FAQ items migrated from `.mvweb-pc-help__faq-item` to `.mvweb-details` component
  • Page title updated to "MVweb Price Table"
  • Copy shortcode button styled as ghost button

Fixed

  • Action buttons layout in forms table (removed `display: flex` on ``, use `white-space: nowrap`)
  • UI Kit: checkbox vertical alignment, input font-size, notice spacing
